name: Google Ad Conversions Plugin (with Zapier)
description: Sends Google Ads conversion events to a Zapier webhook

config.markdown:
Action map: Comma-separated list of action_id:Google conversion name. NOTE: Only specify actions which match *single events* and not event sequences.

Zapier webhook URL: Full URL of the webhook, e.g. `https://hooks.zapier.com/hooks/catch/0123456/abcdef/`

PostHog Host: PostHog Host URL from which to fetch action definitions (in testing, set to `http://localhost:8000`

config.name: Action map: (action_id:Google conversion name)
config.default: 11036:Sign up - cloud,11037:Sign up - self-hosted free,11038:Sign up - self-hosted paid
